mn86:3.9: saṅkaritvā → saṃharitvā saṃharitvā (bj, pts1) | saṅgaritvā (s1-3, km)
mn86:6.11: Mahāvanaṃ pāpuṇi saccavādī → mahāvanaṃ samaṇoyaṃ paccupādi (bj) | mahāvanaṃ samaṇa paccupādi (s1-3, km) | mahāvanaṃ samaṇoyaṃ paccavādi (pts1)
mn86:6.12: Sohaṃ carissāmi pahāya pāpaṃ → sohaṃ carissāpi pahassaṃ pāpaṃ (bj) | sohaṃ cirassāpi pahāssaṃ pāpaṃ (si) | sohaṃ carissāmi pajahissa pāpaṃ (s1-3, km) | sohaṃ cirassā pahāssaṃ pāpaṃ (pts1)
mn86:13.8: Handa ca dāni → handadāni (s1-3, km, pts1)
mn86:15.2: yatohaṃ, bhagini, jāto → bhagini jātiyā jāto (si)
mn86:18.3: pubbeva → yo ca pubbe (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn86:18.24: pana kiñci naṃ → kañcanaṃ (bj) | kañci naṃ (si, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn86:18.38: naṃ hiṃsāmi kiñci naṃ → kañci naṃ (si, s1-3, km, pts1) | kañcanaṃ (?)
mn86:18.59: Svāgataṃ → sāgataṃ (bj, pts1), nāpagataṃ → nāma sagataṃ (mr)
